sentences.en: But a peremptory negative from upstairs prevented any play from being acted thereon.
sentences.cn: 但是来自于楼上不容置疑的反对声,阻止了这戏台上的任何演出.

sentences.en: He had a peremptory blunt butting even bullying manner.
sentences.cn: 有时他神志冷峻,甚至不留情面.

sentences.en: He's much too peremptory to cooperate with others.
sentences.cn: 他太蛮横,没法跟人合作.

sentences.en: His peremptory character makes people around him feel disgusted.
sentences.cn: 他横蛮的性格,让周围的人感到厌恶.

sentences.en: His peremptory style became more understandable.
sentences.cn: 他的专横的作风就变得更加可以理解了.

sentences.en: His peremptory tone of voice irritated everybody.
sentences.cn: 他那专横的口气激怒了大家.

sentences.en: In short, their position as it emerged in the three meetings with us was peremptory unyielding.
sentences.cn: 简单地说, 同我们举行的三次会谈说明他们的立场是蛮横无礼,寸步不让的.

sentences.en: It is wrong to indulge in arbitrary decisions and peremptory actions and to ignore our allies.
sentences.cn: 那种独断专行,把同盟者置之不理的态度,是不对的.

sentences.en: Olivia , curious to see who this peremptory messenger might be , desired he might be admitted.
sentences.cn: 奥丽维娅对这个固执己见的送信人感到好奇,就吩咐叫他进来.

sentences.en: Robert outfaces his perplexity with his most peremptory air.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特尽量以专横神气来掩饰窘迫.

sentences.en: She developed a peremptory and fussy disposition.
sentences.cn: 她养成了一种蛮横和过分注意细节的性格.

sentences.en: She was the mother of two peremptory little boys.
sentences.cn: 她现在已是两个无法无天的小男孩的母亲.

sentences.en: The letter was peremptory in tone.

sentences.cn: 军官发出了不容许辩驳的命令.

sentences.en: There was a peremptory note in his voice.
sentences.cn: 他说话的声音里有一种不容置辩的口气.

words.tran_cn: 强制的；绝对的；断然的；专横的

trans.tran_cn: 断然的，不容置辩的，傲慢的，专横的
trans.tran_en: peremptory behaviour, speech etc is not polite or friendly and shows that the person speaking expects to be obeyed immediately
